articles.title: Euro 2020: Trent Alexander-Arnold named in England's 26-man squad - BBC Sport
articles.description: Liverpool full-back Trent Alexander-Arnold has been named in England's 26-man squad for this summer's European Championship.
articles.content:
Alexander-Arnold has won 12 caps for England and scored once
